snippet: Three workers are responsible for the 39 flags on the stadium’s roof, including the pennants of the 30 major league teams, which must be arranged in the order of the division standings.
abstract: Thirty-nine flags representing all the MLB teams fly atop Yankee Stadium during every home game and are rearranged almost daily according to current division standings; job of raising and lowering flags along catwalk is a labor-intensive one, but breathtaking view of city is worth the effort.
lead_paragraph: Three workers are responsible for the 39 flags on the stadium’s roof, including the pennants of the 30 major league teams, which must be arranged in the order of the division standings.

headline.main: An Up-and-Down Season at Yankee Stadium, at Least for the Flag Crew
headline.print_headline: Ups and Downs Typify This Crew’s Season
